column3: Latest;Prey Nop District – Prey Nop district police arrested a suspect for stealing a motorcycle at 5 pm on August 15 in the village of Trapeang Soy 1
column6: Preah Sihanouk province.------The suspect  40-year-old Tep Savorn
column7: goes by the nickname ‘Mr. Brazil’. He is accused of stealing a motorcycle from Chit Sithorn
column8: a 22 year old garment factory worker. The suspect was arrested by police on the morning of August 16 and the moto was returned to it’s rightful owner.------Source: Huy Bunleng/------https://postnews.com.kh/local/474781
